import React, { useState } from 'react' const Cart = ({ cartItems }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(1); const changeQty = (e) => { setQty(e.target.value); } return (
{
{ cartItems.map((item) => { return (
{item.name}

${item.price * qty}

Quatity
) }) }
}

items $100

) } export default Cart
